main event: A civilian reported seeing two bright reddish objects maneuvering in the sky for about 6-8 seconds on April 15, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted only 6-8 seconds., The objects were reported to make circular, straight, and level maneuvers., The source of the report is described as very reliable., The sighting occurred at approximately 1940 PST., The objects were observed at a speed of 600-800 MPH and an altitude of 1,500-2,000 feet.
witness description: male civilian with a reliable reputation
